title: Yogi Iyengar, Who Helped Bring Yoga To The West, Dies At 95
teaser: The man who helped popularize the practice of yoga around the world has died at the age of 95 in India. B.K.S. Iyengar had created his own brand of yoga, which was practiced by artists like Aldous Huxley.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
